chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
R: BSRS
ff: falsity_flag
A: list form
phi: form

Goal:
trans (A ==> phi) = map trans A ==> trans phi

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
trans = fix trans b (phi : form) {struct phi} : form := match phi in (form f) return form with | falsity => Q | atom _ _ _ b0 P v => match P as P0 return (Vector.t term (ar_preds P0) -> form) with | sPr => fun v0 : Vector.t term (ar_preds sPr) => dnQ (atom sPr v0) | sQ => fun _ : Vector.t term (ar_preds sQ) => Q end v | bin _ _ _ b0 Impl phi1 phi2 => trans b0 phi1 --> trans b0 phi2 | quant _ _ _ b0 All phi0 => ∀ trans b0 phi0 end : forall b, form -> form Arguments trans {b}
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
Double' : forall b (A : list form) (phi : form), A ⊢C phi -> map trans A ⊢I trans phi
trans_trans : forall b (phi : form) (A : list form), A ⊢I (dnQ (trans phi) --> trans phi)
trans_trans' : forall b (phi : form) (A : list form) (sigma tau : nat -> term), map (subst_form tau) A ⊢I (dnQ (trans phi[sigma]) --> trans phi[sigma])
impl_sat : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (ff : falsity_flag) (A : list form) (rho : env D) (phi : form), rho ⊨ (A ==> phi) < -> (rho ⊫ A -> rho ⊨ phi)
Double : forall b (phi : form), [] ⊢C phi -> [] ⊢I trans phi
trans_subst : forall b (sigma : nat -> term) (phi : form), trans phi[sigma] = (trans phi)[sigma]
impl_sat' : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (ff : falsity_flag) (A : list form) (rho : env D) (phi : form), rho ⊨ (A ==> phi) -> rho ⊫ A -> rho ⊨ phi
F = fun (ff : falsity_flag) (R : PCPb_to_FOL.BSRS) => F1 R ==> F2 R ==> F3 - -> Q : forall ff : falsity_flag, PCPb_to_FOL.BSRS -> form Arguments F {ff}
impl_prv : forall (A0 B : list form) (phi0 : form), (rev B ++ A0) ⊢ phi0 -> A0 ⊢ (B ==> phi0) where ?p : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag A : list form phi : form |- peirce]
drv_val : forall (R : PCPb_to_FOL.BSRS) (domain : Type) (I : interp domain) (rho : env domain) (u v : string bool), derivable R u v -> rho ⊨ (F1 R ==> F2 R ==> Pr (enc u) (enc v))
Pc : forall (A : list form) (phi psi : form), A ⊢C (((phi --> psi) --> phi) --> phi)
prv_sind : forall P : forall ff : falsity_flag, peirce -> list form -> form -> SProp, (forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi psi : form), (phi :: A) ⊢ psi -> P ff p (phi :: A) psi -> P ff p A (phi --> psi)) -> (forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi psi : form), A ⊢ (phi --> psi) -> P ff p A (phi --> psi) -> A ⊢ phi -> P ff p A phi -> P ff p A psi) -> (forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi : form), map (subst_form ↑) A ⊢ phi -> P ff p (map (subst_form ↑) A) phi -> P ff p A (∀ phi)) ->...-> P ff p l f6
prv_ind : forall P : forall ff : falsity_flag, peirce -> list form -> form -> Prop, (forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi psi : form), (phi :: A) ⊢ psi -> P ff p (phi :: A) psi -> P ff p A (phi --> psi)) -> (forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi psi : form), A ⊢ (phi --> psi) -> P ff p A (phi --> psi) -> A ⊢ phi -> P ff p A phi -> P ff p A psi) -> (forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi : form), map (subst_form ↑) A ⊢ phi -> P ff p (map (subst_form ↑) A) phi -> P ff p A (∀ phi)) ->...-> P ff p l f6
MND_CND : forall (A : list form) (phi : form), A ⊢M phi -> map cast A ⊢C cast phi
Inductive prv (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) : forall ff : falsity_flag, peirce -> list form -> form -> Prop := II : forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi psi : form), (phi :: A) ⊢ psi -> A ⊢ (phi --> psi) | IE : forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi psi : form), A ⊢ (phi --> psi) -> A ⊢ phi -> A ⊢ psi | AllI : forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi : form), map (subst_form ↑) A ⊢ phi -> A ⊢ (∀ phi) | AllE : forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (t : term) (phi : form), A ⊢...
map_map : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B) (g : B -> C) (l : list A), map g (map f l) = map (fun x : A => g (f x)) l
map_ext : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, map f l = map g l
AllI : forall (A0 : list form) (phi0 : form), map (subst_form ↑) A0 ⊢ phi0 -> A0 ⊢ (∀ phi0) where ?p : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag A : list form phi : form |- peirce]
F1 = fun (ff : falsity_flag) (R : PCPb_to_FOL.BSRS) => map (fun '(x, y) => Pr (enc x) (enc y)) R : forall ff : falsity_flag, PCPb_to_FOL.BSRS -> list form Arguments F1 {ff}
list_prod : forall A B : Type, list A -> list B -> list (A * B)
bounded_subst : bounded ?n ?phi -> (forall k : nat, ?n > k -> ?sigma k = ?tau k) -> ?phi[?sigma] = ?phi[?tau] where ?n : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag A : list form phi : form |- nat] ?phi : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag A : list form phi : form |- form] ?sigma : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag A : list form phi : form |- nat -> term] ?tau : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag A : list form phi : form |- nat -> term]
F2 = fun (ff : falsity_flag) (R : PCPb_to_FOL.BSRS) => map (fun '(x, y) => ∀ (∀ Pr $1 $0 --> Pr (prep x $1) (prep y $0))) R : forall ff : falsity_flag, PCPb_to_FOL.BSRS -> list form Arguments F2 {ff}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
impl = fun (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (ff : falsity_flag) => fix impl (A : list form) (phi : form) {struct A} : form := match A with | [] => phi | psi :: A0 => psi - -> impl A0 phi end : forall (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (ff : falsity_flag), list form -> form -> form Arguments impl {Σ_funcs Σ_preds ff} _%list_scope
soundness : forall (A : list form) (phi : form), A ⊢I phi -> valid_ctx A phi
Kripke.ksoundness : forall (A : list form) (phi : form), A ⊢I phi -> Kripke.kvalid_ctx A phi
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n where ?A : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag A : list form phi : form |- Type] ?B : [R : BSRS ff : falsity_flag A : list form phi : form |- Type]
DN : forall (A : list form) (phi : form), A ⊢C (¬ (¬ phi)) -> A ⊢C phi
BaseLists.incl_nil : forall (X : Type) (A : list X), incl [] A
appCtx : forall b (psi1 psi2 : form) (A : list form), In (psi1 --> psi2) A -> A ⊢I psi1 -> A ⊢I psi2

```coq
Proof.
intro.
apply Double'.
unfold trans, impl, map.
rewrite <- map_map.
rewrite <- map_ext.
intro.
simpl.
rewrite <- H.
auto.
Qed.```

original: intro. apply Double'. unfold trans, impl, map. rewrite <- map_map. rewrite <- map_ext. intro. simpl. rewrite <- H. auto.
